ETYMOLOGY: From Latin sēlēctus, past participle of sēligere (sē- 'apart' + legere 'to gather, choose').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To choose (someone or something) carefully from a group or a number of alternatives as being the best or most suitable.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 从一群或多个选项中仔细选择（某人或某物）作为最佳或最合适的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The committee will select the final three candidates by Friday.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 委员会将在周五选出最后三名候选人。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To mark an item on a computer screen, usually by clicking or dragging, to indicate it is the object of the next operation.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 在计算机屏幕上标记或突出显示一个项目，以指示它将成为下一个操作的目标。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Select the files you want to copy by holding down the Control key.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 按住 Control 键选择您想要复制的文件。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Of high quality or having been chosen with great care; exclusive or restrictive.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 优质的，经过精心挑选的；独家或有限制的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The society held its meeting at a select club downtown.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 该协会在市中心一家精选俱乐部举行了会议。

REGISTER: General usage, formal/business contexts, and technology.
